message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500.  It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8,500 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I need to at least get $9,000 for the product.  I'm confident it will be worth it to you in the long run. What do you think?
I understand your concerns, but $9,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $8,750. I think this is a fair price for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate you coming up on your offer, but $8,750 is still a bit too low for me. I'm happy to continue negotiating, but I need to get at least $8,900 for the product. It's a valuable item, and I believe you'll find it to be worth every penny.  Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I understand your concerns, but $8,900 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering $8,800. I think this is a fair price for both of us, and I'm getting close to my maximum budget.
